comments.body:
Not related to this PR but this signatue

``` ts
 getItemsAsync(): Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation<Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView<Windows.Storage.IStorageItem>>;
```

seems _wrong_ : https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/br227287.aspx?cs-save-lang=1&cs-lang=javascript#code-snippet-1

there are two functions:

getItemsAsync(): 
https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/br227286.aspx

getItemsAsync(startIndex: number, maxItemsToRetrieve: number):
https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/br227287.aspx
currently missing many functions , although not many multiplatform , as I work with this library I will update
